name: dsl-watchdog
short_description:
dsl-watchdog is a set of scripts to check if there's faulty connectivity to internet on home networks using DSL routers and restart the connection or router if needed

The user can use a config file to specify which hosts he wishes to ping and how much package loss is allowed. If the loss is greater than the configured value or 100%, the dsl-watchdog script will call the expect script "restartrouterdsl".

At this moment the "restartrouterdsl" script is able to interact with two router models.
